p: Four kinds T. grandis of wild mutation variety of Zhimafei, Cunguangfei, Xiangyafei, and Dayuanfei and only one cultivar of Torreya grandis after grafting were collected from Zhuji, Zhejiang province, China, in October, 2015. These seeds were subsequently identified and authenticated by Professor Dr. Pinzhang Deng at the Forestry Bureau Zhuji, Zhejiang Province. After authentication, the seeds were cleaned, hulled, and immediately dried in a microwave oven (three space heats for 1 min), before being placed in a drying oven at 65Â°C for 6 h. Twenty-gram samples of the dried seeds were then placed in a QYZ-230 fully automatic hydraulic oil press (Shandong, China) and pressed to obtain the squeezed seed oils.
